text: geudaeege gyesihan yulbeob-eulo geudeul-eul jaepanhadoe geudeul-eul hananim i gyesihan ba-e ttala jaepanhaessdamyeon geudeul-ui yoguleul ttaleuji malmyeo hana nim-i geudaeege gyesihan geos-eulobuteogeudeul-ui italham-eul gyeong-gyehala man-il geudeul-i baebanhandamyeon hananim-eun geudeul-ege geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-ege beol-i naelim-eul geudaeneun al la sillo anh-eun muliga bulboghadeola
